extensionDescription.message: Finds and opens all images under your cursor.

resultsPageTitle.description: Title of the results page at inline.html.

optionsPageTitle.description: Title of the options page at options.html.

menuButtonTextWithNum.description: Context menu button text when there are N images found.

menuButtonTextFrameDisabled.description: Context menu button text when there are iframes.

imgSizeText.description: Text indicating the original image size in pixels.

errorNoImages.description: Error message for when no images could be extracted.

errorTabsSendMessage.message: Error while sending message to tab: $ERR_MSG$
errorTabsSendMessage.description: Error message for errors in tabs.sendMessage().

errorTabsGetCurrent.message: Error while retrieving current tab info: $ERR_MSG$
errorTabsGetCurrent.description: Error message for errors in tabs.getCurrent().

bgCheckbox.description: Bring inline images screen forward option text

bgCheckboxHint.message: If checked, tabs opened by behind! will be active (they will be brought forward)
bgCheckboxHint.description: Bring inline images screen forward option help text

themeHint.message: Theme selection. 'Automatic' option attempts to match the system theme.
